/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++11 -m64 -g -g -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names    -o ../pathtracer ../CGL/src/libCGL.a ../CGL/deps/glew/libglew.a ../CGL/deps/glfw/src/libglfw3.a -framework Cocoa -framework OpenGL -framework IOKit -framework CoreFoundation -framework CoreVideo -framework OpenGL -framework OpenGL /usr/X11R6/lib/libfreetype.dylib -framework IOKit -framework CoreFoundation -framework CoreVideo /usr/X11R6/lib/libfreetype.dylib
